original_title: Rebel Without a Crew: The Robert Rodriguez Film School
overview: 25 years after making his independent film "El Mariachi" for only 7,000 dollars, filmmaker Robert Rodriguez recreates the experience with his micro-budget film, "Red 11," this time documenting his process in order to teach other artists how they can make their dreams a reality.
title: Rebel Without a Crew: The Robert Rodriguez Film School
